scripts.clean: rm -rf client/build/ && rm -rf client/node_modules/ && rm client/package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm package-lock.json
scripts.initialize: npm install && npm run prepare-client && npm run dev
scripts.prepare-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run prepare-client && npm run dev
scripts.sync-server: npm run clean && npm install && npm run prepare-client && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server"
